column3:
MS5.1 - Acropolis: Minimal necessary tracking of governance actions, stake distribution, reward accounts to derive Stake Pool Distribution
Deliverables:  Implementation of modules to track stake, governance and rewards and deriving Stake Pool Distribution Report validating correctness and efficiency of SPD derivation

MS5.2 - Acropolis: Create REST APIs for ledger state, SPD and chain information
Deliverables:  REST API implementations with comprehensive endpoints documented in OpenAPI (Swagger) Performance and load testing report confirming API reliability and response time

MS5.3 - Acropolis: Integrate and test with chosen application team
Deliverables:  Integration test cases, results, and identified improvement areas documented Integration and acceptance test report confirming successful interoperability

MS5.4 - Acropolis: Block header validation
Deliverables:  Block header validation module Test reports

MS5.5 - Acropolis: Ledger state validation
Deliverables:  Upgrades to ledger state derivation modules (see MS1) to report errors Test reports

MS5.6 - Acropolis: Transaction validation - phase 1
Deliverables:  Transaction Phase 1 validation module Test cases and reports

MS5.7 - Acropolis: Transaction validation - phase 2
Deliverables:  Transaction Phase 2 validation module Test cases and reports

MS5.8 - Acropolis: Multi-peer networking
Deliverables:  P2P network module Chain selection / consensus module Test network infrastructure and reports

MS5.9 - Acropolis: Chain storage
Deliverables:  Block store module Test reports

MS5.10 - Acropolis: ChainSync / BlockFetch server
Deliverables:  Block server module Test reports

MS5.11 - Acropolis: Relay node
Deliverables:  Additional modules as required Configuration files and installation guides Live test reports from participation in preview testnet

MS5.12 - Acropolis: Mempool & block production
Deliverables:  Mempool and block building modules. Test reports from manually triggered & dry run block production

MS5.13 - Acropolis: Block producing node - testnet
Deliverables:  KES store / agent, VRF lottery modules, upgrades to P2P for contribution. Test reports from operation on preview testnet

MS5.14 - Acropolis: Block producing node - mainnet
Deliverables:  Test reports from operation on mainnet

MS6.1 - Hydra Development: Hydra V1 feature set
Deliverables:  Improved event sourcing; Bounded memory; production grade monitoring and operations

MS6.2 - Hydra Development: CNT payments across Heads
Deliverables:  Backend that routes payments between Hydra heads; monitor and rebalance liquidity between heads

MS6.3 - Hydra Development: Lightweight Hydra node
Deliverables:  Compile to WASM; mobile/browser compatible network stack; off-chain protocol simplifications (allow being offline in 2 party head)

MS6.4 - Hydra Development: Early bitcoin lightning interoperability
Deliverables:  Backend that routes payments from hydra to lightning node; Browser application that scans a lightning invoice and converts it to a payment in a hydra head

MS6.5 - Hydra Development: Resolve known problems, audit, UX improvements, marketing initiatives
Deliverables:  Partial fanout; no more known issues; no new issues unsolved by audit; updated website and docs, workshops at conferences
